Last connection time: %s Profile Name VPN Provider Tunnel Name Value is required Wi-Fi networks Mobile networks SSID Inclusion List (optional, one per line) SSID Exclusion List (optional, one per line) SIM Operator Name Inclusion List (optional, one per line) SIM Operator Name Exclusion List (optional, one per line) Are you sure you wish to delete this profile? Confirm Cancel No profiles at the moment!\nFeel free to add one.
Permission request Action request VPN Manager has the ability to enable/disable VPNs for specific Wi-Fi SSIDs. This feature requires the location permission. If you are not interested in this feature, you may deny access to this permission. In order for VPN Manager to monitor the connected Wi-FI SSID in the background, the location permission must "allowed all the time". In order for Wireguard to receive actions in the background, battery optimizations must be turned off for Wireguard. The system battery settings will be opened. Search for the Wireguard app and disable battery optimizations. Ensure \"Allow remote control apps\" is enabled in Wireguard. Side Running service status Service is running, notification can be disabled in system app settings Connection status/toggle
main_prefs profiles next_pid perm_check
Check app permissions Ensure relevant permissions are granted for this app Show notification with toggle button when connected to VPN Adds ability to toggle the VPN connection while a profile is active
